t:test_case.t:objective: account setup
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Admin login 2.Create test account 3.Use lmtp inject to inject the message

t:test_case.t:objective: Login as the test account to get message Ids
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Login to the account. 2. Search a mail to get the message-id

t:test_case.t:objective: Adding flag to the 12 messages
Mark 12 messages as read
Reply to the 12 mails
forward the 12 mails
Creating folders in proper structure
Moving messages(mails) to respected folders
Verify that a search for flagged mail in corresponding folders is successful
Verify that a search for unflagged mails in corresponding folders is successful
Verify that a search for read mail in corresponding folders is successful
Verify that a search for unread mails in corresponding folders is successful
Verify that a search for reply mail in corresponding folders is successful
Verify that a search for forward mails in corresponding folders is successful
Verify that a search for flagged mail in corresponding folders is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for unflagged mails in corresponding folders is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for read mail in corresponding folders is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for unread mails in corresponding folders is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for reply mail in corresponding folders is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for forward mails in corresponding folders is successful (for conversation)
